column5: This is gonna be old news for some but it was new to me so I thought it would be some that haven't heard it and would like it so enjoy and good job Cliff.  http://m.facebook.com/l.php?u=http%253A%252F%252Fwww.youtube.com%252Fwatch%253Fv%253DBIW590ZLv_Q&h=160a5&fbb=rc2b57c70&refid=0
That's a great piece of work.  I've have the link to the video as one of my favorites and watch it from time to time.
cool song  but I will not listen to it today  once I hear it..it takes about a week to get it out of my head...it just keeps playing over and over and over and over in my head
Yeah...I'm almost happy to hear an old Wrigley's commercial after that.  Cliff did a miraculous job on that.
Great song about a great community. Thanks for posting.
